APPNAME should show up in your Applications folder within the next 30 minutes.
This application will be installed through the Apple AppStore in the background. AppStore apps can take longer than others to install, and do not provide progress updates.

APPNAME should be removed from your Applications folder within the next 30 minutes.
This application was installed through the Apple AppStore. AppStore apps can take longer than others to remove, and do not provide progress updates.

#!/bin/zsh app='/Applications/APPNAME.app' if [[ ! -d $app ]]; then exit 1 fi
echo $app is installed, uninstalling
